entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Blowing snow at times in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
